snippet: The dominant social network has updated its smartphone interfaces to bring them more into line with the features available to desktop browsers, assuming you know where to look.
abstract: Tool Kit column; Facebook updates its smartphone interfaces to bring them more into line with features available to desktop browsers; some new features are easy to spot, but others are more subtle, and take some poking around to figure out.
lead_paragraph: The dominant social network has updated its smartphone interfaces to bring them more into line with the features available to desktop browsers, assuming you know where to look.

headline.print_headline: More Facebook Changes, Aimed at Users on the Go
headline.seo: Facebook’s Latest Mobile Interface Expands Features
headline.main: More Facebook Changes, Aimed at Users on the Go
